channel.title: Help?! REP++ need help fast
channel.description:
ok im using cleaned v4
and when u put on a jagex item like DFS or GS's, if u put them on, they go on normaly...
but when u put another item on after that, it duzn't give back godsword it gives back shoes (item 9999)
how i make it actualy give back the correct item...?
[IMG]http://i283.photobucket.com/albums/kk310/silabgarza/helpthing.gif[/img]
small vid :o
HELP!!!!
[size=20pt]rep++[/size]

item.title: Help?! REP++ need help fast
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

haha yeah, I’m not a “Pro” lol. hmmm, it looks sort of complicated, but im sure its gotta be something like “Why didn’t i see that before!” =\

[quote=“Matrix Pride, post:8, topic:225283”]GUESS AND CHECK

try replacing 9999 with the GS ID?

i dunno just a wild one[/quote]
she wants to make it so that any shield she wears comes off. not just the dfs

item.title: Help?! REP++ need help fast
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

ya…

im kinda positive has something 2 do with this part…

public void GetBonus() { for (int i = 0; i < playerEquipment.length; i++) { if (playerEquipment[i] > -1) { for (int j = 0; j < 9999; j++) { if (server.itemHandler.ItemList[j] != null){ if (server.itemHandler.ItemList[j].itemId == playerEquipment[i]) { for (int k = 0; k < playerBonus.length; k++) { playerBonus[k] += server.itemHandler.ItemList[j].Bonuses[k]; } break; } } } } } }

Read full topic

item.title: Help?! REP++ need help fast
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

So you coded it to where you can’t wield godswords with shields? and when you wield normal weapons it takes off your shoes…? idk wtf is really going on there, but it looks like you put in the wrong “Getitemslot” or whatever. look over your coding and make sure the item slot is the weapon slot and not the boot slot.

Read full topic
